tweets.text:
üì£ More wiggles and wetland for #Haweswater!

We're excited to announce that we have re-naturalised another channel in Swindale by teaming up with @unitedutilities @EnvAgencyNW @NECumbria @ebsford and @AquaUoS üìΩÔ∏èüëá

https://t.co/z1ZLQlNcBX @RSPBEngland #ReviveOurWorld #Cumbria

We are busy doing CCTV surveys of the existing drainage at various locations in Hebden Bridge in the Calder Valley to help us design the flood defences to better protect the community. 

Next week these will be on Central St & Greenwood St.

#HebdenBridgeFAS #flooding https://t.co/oBHrpPtl71

We run a project every year to replenish sand on #Lincolnshire beaches

It helps protect 20,000 properties from flooding and maintain beaches we love. This year it also won a Considerate Constructors Scheme silver award!

urls.title: UK Climate Projections (UKCP)
urls.description: The UK Climate Projections (UKCP) provides the most up-to-date assessment of how the UK climate may change in the future. Find information that will help your climate change risk assessments and adaptation plans.

Don't feed a fatberg.

Putting used cooking fat and oil down your sink can block pipes, creating fatbergs.

Wait for used fat and oil to cool before scraping it into the bin.

Share this video and help protect the environment.

#Unblocktober https://t.co/O24wtjE4oR
